results.title: Effect of metformin treatment and its time of administration on joint capsular fibrosis induced by mouse knee immobilization
results.text_hl: There are currently no previous reports investigating the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Contracture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003286 @@@joint contracture@@@.

citations.NLM: Tokuda K, Yamanaka Y, Mano Y, Tsukamoto M, Tajima T, Suzuki H, Kawasaki M, Uchida S, Nakamura E, Wang KY, Sakai A. results.title: Metformin protects the ischemic heart by the Akt-mediated inhibition of mitochondrial permeability transition pore opening.
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly inhibited mPTP opening and subsequent @<m>DISEASE_Contracture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003286 @@@rigor contracture@@@ in both Wistar and @CELLLINE_CVCL:2911 @@@GK@@@ cardiomyocytes subjected to oxidative stress, in a @CHEMICAL_Lysine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008239 @@@LY@@@-sensitive manner.

citations.NLM: Bhamra GS, Hausenloy DJ, Davidson SM, Carr RD, Paiva M, Wynne AM, Mocanu MM, Yellon DM. Metformin protects the ischemic heart by the Akt-mediated inhibition of mitochondrial permeability transition pore opening. Basic Res Cardiol. 2008 May;103(3):274-84. PMID: 18080084
